translation: Among the hymns, I am the Brihatsaman; among meters, I am Gayatri; among months, I am Margasirsha; among seasons, I am the flowery season.
commentary: 10.35 Brihatsama Brihatsaman? And also? Samnam among Sama hymns? Gayatri Gayatri? Chhandasam among meters? I'm I? of months among months? Margasirsha Margasirsha? I'm I? of seasons among seasons? Kusumakaraá¸¥ the flowery season (spring).Commentary Brihatsaman is the chief of the hymns of the SamaVeda. Brihat means big.Margasirsha From the middle of December to the middle of January. This has a temperate
